sentences.en: Does the city have any forested parks with scenic paths?
sentences.cn: 本市有什么森林公园里有风景优美的小径?

sentences.en: Forested areas have been expanding every year, with the increase in standing timber greater than that of felled lumber.
sentences.cn: 森林面积每年都在增加,林木生长量大于消耗量.

sentences.en: Forested areas sustain almost as high a population as the agricultural sites.
sentences.cn: 森林区的种群密度与农业区同样的高.

sentences.en: Its forested slopes are streaked with the scars of old lava flos.
sentences.cn: 森林覆盖的山坡上留有一道道之前火山熔岩流过的痕迹.

sentences.en: New Brunswick is one of the most forested regions in the world.
sentences.cn: 新不伦瑞克是世界上森林覆盖最多的地区.

sentences.en: Only 8 per cent of Britain is forested.
sentences.cn: 英国的森林覆盖率只有8%。

sentences.en: Only 8 percent of the area is forested.
sentences.cn: 这里只有百分之八是丛林地带。

sentences.en: The areas of greater rainfall conform roughly with these forested areas.
sentences.cn: 降雨量较大地区大致与这些森林地区相符合.

sentences.en: The road snaked through forested mountains, past the village of San Antonio.
sentences.cn: 这条路在林木覆盖的山上蜿蜒前行，经过圣安东尼奥村。

sentences.en: The road snaked through forested mountains.
They forested the mountains with pine trees.
Thickly forested land had to be cleared.
sentences.cn: 浓密的森林地面必须开垦出来.

sentences.en: This mountain is heavily forested after ten years of protection from loggers.
sentences.cn: 禁止伐木十年后的今天,这座山森林茂密.

sentences.en: Unlike Lumber Camps , Lumber Mills can gather Wood from any forested area.
sentences.cn: 和马车的建造的木材采集地不同, 木材采集机能从任何的植树区域发掘木材.

sentences.en: When forested land must be used, all stumps should be removed.
sentences.cn: 如不得不用林地时, 所有伐桩都要消除.

phrases.tran_cn: 森林火灾；森林大火；山火
国家森林；国有林；国有森林
热带森林，热带雨林；热带林

trans.tran_en: A forested area is an area covered in trees growing closely together
